definition: in all directions/all around/far and near
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: Like an animal at bay, the bandit chieftain laid about in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 土匪頭子困獸猶鬥，在絕望中向四面八方亂打一氣。

sentences.english: The city sprawls for miles in each direction.
sentences.chinese: 這座城市向四面八方擴展了幾英里。

sentences.english: We take your bags and send them in all directions。
sentences.chinese: 我們將拿走您的行李，送往四面八方。

sentences.english: In our modern society we have a huge amount of things coming at us from all directions.
sentences.chinese: 在現代社會，我們有來自四面八方的大量事情要做。

sentences.english: More incapable withstanding in all directions accusation.
sentences.chinese: 更無力承受四面八方的指責。

sentences.english: A confluent small-pox had in all directions flowed over his face .
sentences.chinese: 天花打四面八方匯合攏來，佈滿了他整個臉孔。

sentences.english: The affrighted poultry fled in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 受驚的家禽向四面八方逃去。

sentences.english: A system of roads radiates from the town centre.
sentences.chinese: 一組道路從市中心向四面八方伸展出去。

sentences.english: I love the pression from everything.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡來自四面八方的壓力。

sentences.english: The fires were spreading in all directions in the dry conditions.
sentences.chinese: 大火在乾燥的天氣下正向四面八方蔓延。

sentences.english: The prospecting team traversed far and wide in search of mineral deposits.
sentences.chinese: 地質勘探隊爲尋找礦藏而走遍四面八方。

sentences.english: All around we hear wolves howling.
sentences.chinese: 四面八方都能聽見狼嚎聲。

sentences.english: Temple was very small, but people from all the directions went there and kowtowed to the deities.
sentences.chinese: 廟雖小，但來四面八方的人們都來這兒向神靈朝拜。

sentences.english: It was ingeniously designed so that one can enjoy the view from all four sides.
sentences.chinese: 它設計得真妙，從四面八方都可以賞景。

sentences.english: Like an animal at bay, the bandit chieftain laid about him in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 土匪頭子困獸猶鬥，在絕望中向四面八方亂打一氣。

sentences.english: They set up lights and vehicles carry recyclables in from all directions.
sentences.chinese: 看他們點了燈，一輛一輛的環保車四面八方。

definition: to disperse/to scatter in all directions
to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
lit. to topple the mountains and overturn the seas (idiom); earth-shattering/fig. gigantic/of spectacular significance
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
lit. by the thousands and tens of thousands (idiom); untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
